Articles.Content:
Hey guys, saw a screenshot from this game on a mates facebook with jeb, looked it up and have been addicted ever since.

Been playing about a week and a half now some evening after work and I thought I might share what I have achieved so far.

I must admit I have watched alot of tutorials and borrowed some designs from around the interwebs but alot of trial and error and some massive explosions on the launch pad have been the greatest learning tool. You can never have enough struts

Achievements so far:

Orbit

Geosynch Orbit

Inclined orbits (due to out of control launches)

Gemini Style Docking

Docking and EVA's

Station with fuel reserves, docking ports, power generation and comms suite (based of OASIS station but reduced parts massively to be usable on my laptop)

Near pass of Mun (was attempting to hit it)

Mods used:

RemoteTech 2 (love the challenge of setting up satellite network)

FAR (45 degree AOA gravity turn at over Mach1 just isnt right, now i enjoy tumbling space craft daily on launch)

Engineer Redux (to fine tune geostationary)

Protractor (just started using it tonight)

Mechjeb (well its just makes life easier doesnt it)

Let me know what you think guys

Thanks Tw1 for showing how to get the pics working

Javascript is disabled. View full album

He did try to upload an imgur album, but because imgur is not simple at all, the best of us fail. I'd recommend postimage, simply because TinyPic thinks you're a spambot unless you log in.
